name: Nukenin and the Ronin
overview: A sample game released in "The Shoot Em Up Destruction Set" and also in Commodore Zone #10. Nukenin & The Ronin is a game set in medieval Japan. You control the Nukenin who is armed with a deadly katana blade. A second player can join in the action at any time and control the Ronin who uses shuriken to dispatch the renegade Ninjas and Samurai!
